## Description {#details}

This analysis provides information for a loop nest.

The analysis runs on demand and can be initiated via AM.getResult&lt;LoopNestAnalysis&gt;.

Definition at line 202 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopnestanalysis-h">LoopNestAnalysis.h</a>.
